item.title: 01-Markdown Test
item.description: Math formula Code block Table Image Hyperlink Test01: Math formula Inline formula This is an inline formula $\alpha+\beta=\gamma$ Single line formula $$\alpha+\beta=\gamma$$ Fomula with both When $a \ne 0$, there are two solutions to $ax^2 + bx + c = 0$ and they are $$x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.$$ Test02: Code block Python code example @requires_authorization def somefunc(param1='', param2=0): '''A docstring''' if param1 > param2: # interesting print 'Greater' return (param2 - param1 + 1) or None class SomeClass: pass C++ code example #include "base/kaldi-common.
